messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fall conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/8/03 1:06:39 PM, Playn4pars@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/8/03 1:06:39 PM, Playn4pars@... writes:

<< Better yet, I lobby for a live feed real time internet video
conference/hook
up with write in interaction from around the world! Then everyone interested
could attend! >>

It would be cheaper for everyone who wanted to to just GO there! <g>

messages.subject: Fall conference
messages.msgSnippet: Please Septemeber please oh please. We re planning to move home to England at the end of Sept and I ll never make it back to the US :-( What a move--way
messages.messageBody:
Please Septemeber please oh please.
We're planning to move home to England at the end of Sept and I'll never make
it back to the US :-(


What a move--way exciting! You'll know it's really happening when that semi
parks those big ol' shipping containers in your street....Good Luck!

Can the conference taped--dvd, video, or CD/cassette if it's not already
offered?
Better yet, I lobby for a live feed real time internet video conference/hook
up with write in interaction from around the world! Then everyone interested
could attend!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
